messages.title: LEAVERS – DON'T WASTE YOUR VOTES!
messages.content: More than 90% of Labour MPs are Remainers. Yet more than 60% of Labour constituencies voted to leave. In an area like the North East, 85% of Labour seats voted Leave. Some of Britain's staunchest Leave seats are 'represented' by Labour Remainers. Yet there are around 150 Parliamentary seats that the Tories have not won for at least 50 years – and can't win in this election. In the May European Election, The Brexit Party won more votes than Labour and the Tories combined. The Brexit Party can beat Corbyn's Remainer Labour in the Brexit heartlands.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We must control our laws, borders, money and defence
Let's make Parliament serve the People
Keep investing, better management, less waste
Spend £200bn on transport and jobs in the Regions
We need a fair, firm points-based system

mentions.tacticalSituation: In the May European Election, The Brexit Party won more votes than Labour and the Tories combined. The Brexit Party can beat Corbyn's Remainer Labour in the Brexit heartlands.

issues.brexitEurope: A Clean-Break Brexit — we must control our laws, borders, money and defence. The only way we can hold Boris to his word is by electing Brexit Party MPs.
issues.economy: A Brexit dividend - spend £200bn on transport and jobs in the Regions
issues.governance: Fundamental democratic reform - let's make Parliament serve the People
issues.health: Supporting the NHS - keep investing, better management, less waste
issues.immigration: Controlled immigration - we need a fair, firm points-based system

quotes.text: In the May European Election, The Brexit Party won more votes than Labour and the Tories combined. The Brexit Party can beat Corbyn's Remainer Labour in the Brexit heartlands.

A graph showing European election result for The Brexit Party, Labour, and Conservatives
